{"language":"python","parent":["a = "5"     #文字列として 5 を代入
print(type(a))  #a の型を確認
a = int(a)      #a を整数型に変換し、a に再代入
print(type(a))  #再度 a の型を確認"],"caption":[]}

{"icon":{"type":"emoji","emoji":"☝"},"color":"blue_background","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":true,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"int(a)","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"を実行するだけでは変換されないので、","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":true,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"a = int(a)","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"のように再代入する必要があるよ！","href":null}]}

{"language":"python","parent":["print("三角形の面積を求めます")
a = input("高さを入力：")
b = input("底辺を入力：")
a = int(a)
b = int(b)
print("高さ", a, "、底辺", b, "の三角形の面積は", a * b / 2)"],"caption":[]}
